channel.title: Posts on Log4j Exploitability Index
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Log4j Exploitability Index

item.title: Siemens Siveillance Identity V1.5
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Currently no remediation is available. Block both incoming and outgoing connections betwen the system and the Internet. See further recommendations from Siemens Advisory SSA-661257 CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-21 22:43:46 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.

item.title: Siemens Spectrum Power 4
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Update to V4.70 SP9 and apply the patch provided via customer support. See further recommendations from Siemens Advisory SSA-661257 CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-21 22:43:46 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.

item.title: Siemens Teamcenter
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Remove the JndiLookup class from the classpath. Find detailed remediation and mitigation information here. See further recommendations from Siemens Advisory SSA-661257 CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-21 22:43:46 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.
